sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="v_plugin"> <v_plugin action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>inactive</active> <available_version>1.0.0</available_version> <definition><![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <plugin id="com.snc.project_management_v3" name="Project Management" version="1.0.0" cache_flush="true" provider_name="ServiceNow" state="published" type="application" help="Project_Management_v3_Plugin" licensable="true" license_model="producer"> <requires> <import plugin="com.snc.project_management_delete" /> <import plugin="com.glide.schedules"/> <import plugin="com.snc.planned_task_v2"/> <import plugin="com.snc.time_card"/> <import plugin="com.snc.skills_management"/> <import plugin="com.snc.process_flow_formatter" /> <import plugin="com.snc.cost_management"/> <import plugin="com.snc.project_management_db_views" /> <import plugin="com.snc.project_workbench" /> <import plugin="com.snc.timeline_visualization"/> <import plugin="com.glide.ui.checklist"/> </requires> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="ProjectManagementAPI" class="com.snc.project_management.engine.ProjectManagementAPI" /> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="PPMConfig" class="com.snc.project_management.PPMConfig" /> <description>The Project Management application aids in planning, organizing and managing projects and resources in order to setup, execute, and complete a project faster and easier. Only upgrade is allowed for this plugin. Activation should be done through Project Portfolio Suite with Financials plugin.</description> <no_activate>true</no_activate> </plugin> ]]></definition> <description>The Project Management application aids in planning, organizing and managing projects and resources in order to setup, execute, and complete a project faster and easier. Only upgrade is allowed for this plugin. Activation should be done through Project Portfolio Suite with Financials plugin.</description> <has_demo_data>true</has_demo_data> <help>http://docs.servicenow.com/?context=Project_Management_v3_Plugin</help> <id>com.snc.project_management_v3</id> <licensable>true</licensable> <name>Project Management</name> <path>plugin://com.snc.project_management_v3/</path> <provider>ServiceNow</provider> <requires>com.snc.project_management_delete,com.glide.schedules,com.snc.planned_task_v2,com.snc.time_card,com.snc.skills_management,com.snc.process_flow_formatter,com.snc.cost_management,com.snc.project_management_db_views,com.snc.project_workbench,com.snc.timeline_visualization,com.glide.ui.checklist</requires> <scope>global</scope> <state>published</state> <supports_rollback>false</supports_rollback> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_created_on> <sys_id>com.snc.project_management_v3</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_updated_on> <trackable>true</trackable> <type>application</type> <version>1.0.0</version> </v_plugin> </record_update>
